Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this product into your life soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
